mapper.select: select count(*) from t_military as tc where 1=1

select tc.* from t_military as tc where 1=1 order by tc.oid desc
limit #{start},#{length}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_military
stu_id,
level,
good_flag,
status,
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodFlag = #{goodFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_military
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
good_flag = #{goodFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
